item.title: Intro to Cpp
item.description: Below are programs to summarise basics of C++ which I am learning in my Data Structures & Algorithms class. Program 1: Namespace, printout /* Program 1: Namespace, printing out */ #include <iostream>using namespace std; int main() { int currentMillenium = 2000 ; cout << "The current millenium is: " << currentMillenium << endl; return 0; } Note the return value refers to the program’s exit code, which is 0 by default.
